properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , GENDER , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ADDRESS , USER_GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , USER_CERTIFY , USER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , GENDER , USER_PHONE , USER_EMAIL , USER_ADDRESS , USER_GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , USER_CERTIFY , USER_NICKNAME ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 10 , SYSDATE , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT )
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_NAME = ? , USER_PHONE = ? , USER_EMAIL = ? , USER_ADDRESS = ? , USER_NICKNAME = ? WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , GENDER , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ADDRESS , USER_GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , USER_CERTIFY , USER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ? WHERE USER_NO = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , GENDER , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ADDRESS , USER_GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , USER_CERTIFY , USER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NAME = ? AND USER_EMAIL = ?

SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , GENDER , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ADDRESS , USER_GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , USER_CERTIFY , USER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_NAME = ? AND USER_EMAIL = ?

SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , GENDER , USER_EMAIL , USER_PHONE , USER_ADDRESS , USER_GRADE , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , USER_CERTIFY , USER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_NAME = ? AND USER_EMAIL = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_NICKNAME , USER_NAME , GENDER , USER_ADDRESS , USER_PHONE , ENROLL_DATE FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE USER_NO = ?
SELECT WCK_NO , W.USER_NO , TITLE , USER_ID , USER_NICKNAME , USER_NAME , CREATE_DATE FROM WCHECK W JOIN MEMBER M ON(W.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE W.STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_GRADE = 20 WHERE USER_NO = ?
UPDATE WCHECK SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE WCK_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NICKNAME = ?
